title: Gravity Watch Face
summary: Stunning, 3D dynamic watch face for Android Wear.
description: Gravity is a variation of a popular Dots Watch Face, that goes a step ahead.3D layering is even more powerful due to perspective that is changing with every wrist move. It makes this watch face even more alive.Additional 5-seconds orbit gives it more dynamics, so checking time will never be boring.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Gravity is a variation of a popular Dots Watch Face, that goes a step ahead.

3D layering is even more powerful due to perspective that is changing with every wrist move. It makes this watch face even more alive.

Additional 5-seconds orbit gives it more dynamics, so checking time will never be boring.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: Design Good, All-Axis Gyroscopic Effect... Not So Much Please add an option to disable the gyroscopic effect. I love the design of this watch but the effect is just dizzying.
Like this even more than Dots, but an option for a 12 hour clock would be great.
Awesome watch face, but I wish there was an option to disable the 3d gyro effects.
recentChanges: - New all-axis 3D effect that sets orbits parallel to the ground,
- Stars in the background, so you can feed the depth even more!
